channel.title: Compiler issue
channel.description:
when i compile my server i got somthing like this...
Server compiling... 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. ::::::::::::::::::::: :server compiled!:: ::::::::::::::::::::: Press any key to continue...
How can i fix it?

item.title: Compiler issue
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

set your environmental variables, also post all batch file related questions/issues in the sticky.

Read full topic
